snippet: The director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Tuesday that the Ebola outbreak in West Africa could be brought under control.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Dir Dr Thomas R Frieden says Ebola outbreak in West Africa can be controlled but recovery will be fragile.
lead_paragraph: The director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Tuesday that the Ebola outbreak in West Africa could be brought under control.
